title: Strengthening Practical Customer Service Skills: Crisis Response Science Education: Language Domain Through 3-Stage Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze crisis situations within scientific and social contexts and derive linguistic expression strategies
Interpret crisis-related data to create risk assessment reports and communication messages

Learners apply crisis management strategies (crisis phase classification, response protocols, etc.) to draft a crisis response manual based on real customer complaint cases within three days and achieve over 80% suitability scores in peer reviews and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
